## PluginMetadata.id property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Unique identifier for this plugin.

**Signature:**

```typescript
readonly id: string;
```

## Remarks

Should be a valid npm package name fragment (lowercase, hyphens allowed). Used to construct fully-qualified capability IDs like `{pluginId}:{capabilityId}`<!-- -->.

## Example

'typescript', 'graphql', 'openapi'
